009package imagingbook.common.morphology;
010
011import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
012
013/**
014 * Common interface for all binary morphological operators.
015 * @author WB
016 */
017public interface BinaryMorphologyOperator {
018        
019        /**
020         * Applies this morphological operator to the specified image 
021         * (destructively, that is, the image is modified).
022         * 
023         * @param bp the image the operator is applied to
024         */
025        public void applyTo(ByteProcessor bp);
026
027}
